comment: Substituting ` y ` for ` x ` and then ` z ` for ` y ` is equivalent to substituting ` z ` for both ` x ` and ` y ` . For a version requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ sbcom3vv . (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 8-Apr-2018.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-11 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 16-Sep-2018.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Sep-2018.)
